src_original: sarvasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,  ye 'pi cānye sarvasamādhisamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate,
ye 'pi cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
maitrīsamādheś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,  samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
parāṃś ca karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu samādāpayiṣyati,  karuṇāmuditopekṣāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
ye 'pi cānye karuṇāmuditopekṣāḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ātmanā ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati,
ye 'pi cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
āttnanā cāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyati,  parāṃś ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati,
ye 'pi cānye mārgaṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyante teṣāṃ api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ātmanā ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpatsyate,  parāṃś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
ye 'pi cānye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate,  parāṃś ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati
daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
